name: Dungeon Pong
description: This was created in a week a long time ago, recently I have found myself creating more projects, but I haven't touched this place in a bit. So here is that very terribly programmed boss encounter nobody wanted. All the assets are handmade by myself and a classmate, which will explain the very inconsistent design. This game was rushed to reach a minimal viable product, however I have zero ideas with this and it will probably never branch into an actual game. Main things to keep note, sometimes breaks and no controller support.
